import React, {Component} from 'react' export default function Restaurant() { const [allValues, setAllValues] = React.useState({ type: '', price: '' }) const handleChange = e => { setAllValues({...allValues, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}); } class App extends Component { fileSelectHandler = event => { console.log(event.target.files[0]); } render() { return (
); } } }
